sources.title: The Sawmill
sources.description: This got famous for the most expensive short silent comedy that was ever produced. A bumbling sawmill employee (Larry Semon) tries to win the hand of the owner's daughter (Ann Hastings) while staying out of the clutches of the mill's bullying foreman (Oliver Hardy).

sources.title: THE SAWMILL ( 1922) Larry Semon, Oliver Hardy
sources.description: THE SAWMILL (1922)Â  Starring: Larry Semon, Kathleen O'Connor, Oliver Hardy, Frank Alexander Directed by Larry Semon and Norman Taurog Vitagraph Film Company William Thomas Sherman, wts@gunjones.com, http://www.mn-hp.com

metadata.Plot: A bumbling sawmill employee tries to win the hand of the owner's daughter while staying out of the clutches of the mill's bullying foreman.
